mapper.sql: id,order_code as orderCode, order_state as orderState, order_price as orderPrice, merchant_id as merchantId, open_id as openId, vip_code as vipCode, vip_state as vipState, vip_start_time as vipStartTime, vip_end_time as vipEndTime, third_oeder_code as thirdOederCode,prepay_id as prepayId
mapper.insert:
insert into t_order ( order_code, order_state, order_price, merchant_id, open_id, vip_code, vip_state, vip_start_time, vip_end_time, third_oeder_code) values
( #{item.orderCode}, #{item.orderState}, #{item.orderPrice}, #{item.merchantId}, #{item.openId}, #{item.vipCode}, #{item.vipState}, #{item.vipStartTime}, #{item.vipEndTime}, #{item.thirdOederCode})
mapper.update:
update t_order
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vip_code = #{vipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vip_state = #{vipState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_start_time = #{vipStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vip_end_time = #{vipEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
third_oeder_code = #{thirdOederCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prepay_id = #{prepayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_order where vip_start_time < #{date} and order_state = 1
select sum(order_price) as earnings from t_order where order_state = 3 and merchant_id = #{merchantId} and settle_account_state = 0
